title: Ep 257: The Cl*t is Not a DJ Booth (Ft. Michelle Hope)
itunes:title: Ep 257: The Cl*t is Not a DJ Booth (Ft. Michelle Hope)
description:
On this week’s episode the duo is joined by Sexpert Michelle Hope to TALK ABOUT SEX! The ladies start off with a fun ice breaker game before jumping into Michelle’s recent viral moment after her appearance on 8atthetable where she discusses the harm we are causing in our community surrounding our language around sex. How we talk about sex can be just as damaging to the development of sexual strides, Weezy disagrees. For the Whorederve, Michelle shares tips on clitoral stimulation. Enjoy a full conversation on conversations around sex with strangers, friends, family and lovers and how to get over the uncomfortable talks.


Follow this week’s guest on all social platforms @MHsexpert


Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii B @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages

Instagram @whoreible_decisions

Twitter @whoreiblepod


Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!
